```{r}
tree_rec <- recipe(score ~ ., data = train)
tree_prep <- prep(tree_rec)
juiced <- juice(tree_prep)
```

```{r}
tune_spec <- rand_forest(
  mtry = tune(),
  trees = 1000,
  min_n = tune()
) %>%
  set_mode("regression") %>%
  set_engine("ranger")
```


```{r}
tune_wf <- workflow() %>%
  add_recipe(tree_rec) %>%
  add_model(tune_spec)
```

```{r}
doParallel::registerDoParallel()

set.seed(123)
trees_folds <- vfold_cv(train)
tune_res <- tune_grid(
  tune_wf,
  resamples = trees_folds,
  grid = 20
)

tune_res
```

```{r}
tune_res %>%
  show_best("rmse", n = 10) %>%
  arrange(mtry)
```

```{r}
rf_grid <- grid_regular(
  mtry(range = c(10, 50)),
  min_n(range = c(1, 30)),
  levels = 5
)

set.seed(123)
regular_res <- tune_grid(
  tune_wf,
  resamples = trees_folds,
  grid = rf_grid
)

regular_res
```

```{r}
regular_res %>%
  collect_metrics() %>%
  filter(.metric == "rmse") %>%
  mutate(min_n = factor(min_n)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(mtry, mean^2, color = min_n)) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.5, size = 1.5) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(y = "mse")
```
```{r}
best_rmse <- select_best(regular_res, "rmse")

final_rf <- finalize_model(
  tune_spec,
  best_rmse
)

final_rf
```
```{r}
final_wf <- workflow() %>%
  add_recipe(tree_rec) %>%
  add_model(final_rf)

final_res <- final_wf %>%
  fit(train)

y_pred <- final_res %>%
  predict(new_data = valid)

mse <- function(y_true, y_pred){
  val <- mean((y_true-y_pred)^2)
  return (val)
}

y_true <- as.vector(valid$score)
y_pred <- as.vector(y_pred)

mse(y_true, y_pred)

sum((y_true-y_pred)^2)/length(y_true)
```
